item.title: By: Muhammad Ackreman
item.dc:creator: Muhammad Ackreman
item.description:
There are some wrong information presented here. I've read a certain section from this blog, "শিব সংযমী দেবতা" and I've found some wrong information.
1. "সংস্কৃতে ‘রুদ্র’ শব্দের অর্থ হচ্ছে রক্তবর্ণ" But in Sanskrit, Rudra means "terrific, terrible" ref: http://sanskritdictionary.com/?q=rudra
2. "তাঁর তিন স্ত্রী সতী, পাৰ্বতী ও গঙ্গা" - Shiva had many more wives, not "তিন স্ত্রী" and all were same "Adishakti" claimed by Hindu Myth. But can you give any authentic reference where "গঙ্গা - is a Wife of Shiva" ? Shiva was GANGA DHAR (Holding the Ganga, on his head), where it is written that "Ganga was wife of Shiva"? Provide us authentic reference.
3. "দুই কন্যা লক্ষ্মী ও সরস্বতী" - provide this information from authentic source. Lakshmi and Saraswati were not daughter of Shiva as per Mythology. Shiva had 3 children, "Kartikeya, Ganesh, Ashoka Sundari".

There are some wrong information presented here. I’ve read a certain section from this blog, “শিব সংযমী দেবতা” and I’ve found some wrong information.

1. “সংস্কৃতে ‘রুদ্র’ শব্দের অর্থ হচ্ছে রক্তবর্ণ” But in Sanskrit, Rudra means “terrific, terrible”
ref: http://sanskritdictionary.com/?q=rudra

2. “তাঁর তিন স্ত্রী সতী, পাৰ্বতী ও গঙ্গা” – Shiva had many more wives, not “তিন স্ত্রী” and all were same “Adishakti” claimed by Hindu Myth. But can you give any authentic reference where “গঙ্গা – is a Wife of Shiva” ? Shiva was GANGA DHAR (Holding the Ganga, on his head), where it is written that “Ganga was wife of Shiva”? Provide us authentic reference.

3. “দুই কন্যা লক্ষ্মী ও সরস্বতী” – provide this information from authentic source. Lakshmi and Saraswati were not daughter of Shiva as per Mythology. Shiva had 3 children, “Kartikeya, Ganesh, Ashoka Sundari”.
